mapper.update: UPDATE room SET room_hits = room_hits + 1 WHERE room_number = #{value};

UPDATE room SET room_likes = room_likes
+ 1
- 1
WHERE room_number = #{likes_room};
UPDATE room SET room_status = ((room_status + 1) % 2) WHERE room_number = #{value};
mapper.select: select room_img_number, room_img from room_img where room_img_number = #{value}

select
max(room_lease_num) as maxLease max(room_deposit_num) as maxDeposit,max(room_monthly_rent_num) as maxRent
,min(room_lease_num) as minLease ,min(room_deposit_num) as minDeposit,min(room_monthly_rent_num) as minRent
FROM room
AND ST_Distance( room_lat_lng, ST_GeomFromText(#{point}) ) <= #{distance}
AND #{lat} = room_lat AND #{lng} = room_lng
AND room_number = #{room_number}
AND room_selling_type = '전세'
AND room_selling_type = '월세'
#{item}
order by 1=1
,ST_Distance( room_lat_lng, ST_GeomFromText(#{point}) )
,room_lease_num desc
,room_deposit_num desc ,room_monthly_rent_num desc
,room_lease_num desc ,room_deposit_num desc ,room_monthly_rent_num desc
,room_lease_num asc
,room_deposit_num asc ,room_monthly_rent_num asc
,room_lease_num asc ,room_deposit_num asc ,room_monthly_rent_num asc
,room_likes desc
,room_create_date desc
